message.content:
Monday:
- Breakfast: Oatmeal with sliced banana, chia seeds, and a drizzle of maple syrup. Serve with a side of fresh berries.
- Snack: Apple slices with sunflower seed butter.
- Lunch: Quinoa salad with roasted sweet potato, kale, chickpeas, dried cranberries, and a lemon vinaigrette dressing.
- Snack: Carrot sticks with hummus dip.
- Dinner: Grilled chicken breast with steamed broccoli and brown rice. Top the chicken with a homemade salsa made from tomatoes, red onion, cilantro, lime juice, and salt.

Tuesday:
- Breakfast: Scrambled eggs with spinach, mushrooms, and turkey bacon. Serve with whole wheat toast.
- Snack: Rice cake with avocado slices and a sprinkle of sea salt.
- Lunch: Turkey and cucumber roll-ups (turkey wrapped around cucumber slices) with a side of grape tomatoes and bell pepper strips.
- Snack: Celery sticks with sunflower seed butter and raisins.
- Dinner: Baked salmon with roasted asparagus and sweet potato wedges.

Wednesday:
- Breakfast: Smoothie bowl made with frozen berries, spinach, almond milk, and a scoop of protein powder. Top with sliced banana and pumpkin seeds.
- Snack: Homemade trail mix (sunflower seeds, pumpkin seeds, dried cranberries, and raisins).
- Lunch: Chickpea salad with mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, and a lemon vinaigrette dressing.
- Snack: Sliced bell pepper with sunflower seed butter.
- Dinner: Grilled tofu with roasted Brussels sprouts and brown rice. Season the tofu with salt, pepper, and garlic powder (use sparingly).

Thursday:
- Breakfast: Greek yogurt with sliced strawberries, blueberries, and a drizzle of maple syrup. Serve with whole wheat toast.
- Snack: Rice cake with sunflower seed butter and banana slices.
- Lunch: Quinoa bowl with mixed greens, roasted sweet potato, chickpeas, dried cranberries, and a lemon vinaigrette dressing.
- Snack: Carrot sticks with hummus dip.
- Dinner: Grilled steak with roasted broccoli and brown rice. Season the steak with salt, pepper, and a small amount of garlic powder (use sparingly).

Friday:
- Breakfast: Avocado toast with sliced tomato and sea salt. Serve with a side of fresh berries.
- Snack: Apple slices with sunflower seed butter.
- Lunch: Turkey wrap made with whole wheat tortilla, turkey, mixed greens, cucumber, red onion, and a lemon vinaigrette dressing (use the wrap as a replacement for the tortilla).
- Snack: Celery sticks with sunflower seed butter and raisins.
- Dinner: Grilled chicken breast with roasted asparagus and sweet potato wedges. Top the chicken with a homemade salsa made from tomatoes, red onion, cilantro, lime juice, and salt.

Saturday:
- Breakfast: Scrambled eggs with spinach, mushrooms, and turkey bacon. Serve with whole wheat toast.
- Snack: Rice cake with avocado slices and a sprinkle of sea salt.
- Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, and a lemon vinaigrette dressing.
- Snack: Sliced bell pepper with sunflower seed butter.
- Dinner: Baked salmon with roasted Brussels sprouts and brown rice.

Sunday:
- Breakfast: Smoothie bowl made with frozen berries, spinach, almond milk, and a scoop of protein powder. Top with sliced banana and pumpkin seeds.
- Snack: Homemade trail mix (sunflower seeds, pumpkin seeds, dried cranberries, and raisins).
- Lunch: Chickpea salad with mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, and a lemon vinaigrette dressing.
- Snack: Carrot sticks with hummus dip.
- Dinner: Grilled steak with roasted broccoli and brown rice. Season the steak with salt, pepper, and a small amount of garlic powder (use sparingly).
